target: i know that all too well . i am a 5th grade teacher
context: <user> i am so tired . i am ready to clock out . are you at work ?  <system>  yes , i am . i know how you feel . <user> between my wife , two kids , and work , i sleep 10 hours to be rested .  <system>  i am so ready to go home , relax and watch tv <user> i am going with you ! can i bring my guitar ?  <system>  of course you can . we can jam and have a few cold ones . <user> i am in . we need a few more members and we can tour .  <system>  instead of going to my house , we can go to the lake<user> i have the wife and kids though . i will leave the factory early .  <system>  no one said that they were not welcome too<user> it would be much more relaxing without them . you have kids ?  <system>  no . i do not .<user> do not do it . you spend all your time working for them .  <system>
